tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE knowledge_base_articles (
    article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    article_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    created_by VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    last_modified_by VARCHAR(100),
    last_modified_at TIMESTAMP,
    content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE version_control_articles (
  article_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  article_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  author VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  last_modified TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE revision_history (
  revision_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  article_id UUID NOT NULL,
  revision_number INT NOT NULL,
  revision_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  revision_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE articles (
  article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title TEXT,
  content TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP,
  author TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE revisions (
  revision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  article_id INT,
  revision_number INT,
  revised_content TEXT,
  revised_by TEXT,
  revision_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (article_id) REFERENCES articles(article_id)
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username TEXT,
  email TEXT,
  role TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE articles (
    article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    content TEXT NOT NULL,
    author VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE revisions (
    revision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    article_id INT REFERENCES articles(article_id),
    revision_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    revised_content TEXT NOT NULL,
    revised_by VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE revision_comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    revision_id INT REFERENCES revisions(revision_id),
    comment_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    commented_by VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    commented_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE article_versions (
  article_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  version_number INT,
  author_id UUID,
  revision_date TIMESTAMP,
  content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE authors (
  author_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  author_name VARCHAR,
  email VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE revisions (
  revision_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  article_id UUID,
  version_number INT,
  editor_id UUID,
  revision_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE editors (
  editor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  editor_name VARCHAR,
  email VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE article_categories (
  category_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  category_name VARCHAR
)
